name: The Hester Occasional Table
description: An ever-popular occasional table with a graceful silhouette and gently curved legs, the Hester can be beautifully finished in any of DAVIDSONs eye-catching timbers with a perfect, high-gloss or satin sheen. The table boasts a circular top, with a striking radial pattern that sits on three gently curved legs, which stand on a smooth, facetted base in typical Art Deco style, an expression of robust beauty and effortless grace. There is a central disc where the legs join, and four feet finished in high-gloss black lacquer complete the look. If preferred, the central disc and feet can be finished to match the primary finish.
